11 template <typename VoxelType>
12 Block<VoxelType>::Block(const BlockProto& proto)
13  : Block(proto.voxels_per_side(), proto.voxel_size(),
14  Point(proto.origin_x(), proto.origin_y(), proto.origin_z())) {
15  has_data_ = proto.has_data();
16 
17  // Convert the data into a vector of integers.
18  std::vector<uint32_t> data;
19  data.reserve(proto.voxel_data_size());
20 
21  for (uint32_t word : proto.voxel_data()) {
22  data.push_back(word);
23  }
24 
25  deserializeFromIntegers(data);
26 }
27 
28 template <typename VoxelType>
29 void Block<VoxelType>::getProto(BlockProto* proto) const {
30  CHECK_NOTNULL(proto);
31 
32  proto->set_voxels_per_side(voxels_per_side_);
33  proto->set_voxel_size(voxel_size_);
34 
35  proto->set_origin_x(origin_.x());
36  proto->set_origin_y(origin_.y());
37  proto->set_origin_z(origin_.z());
38 
39  proto->set_has_data(has_data_);
40 
41  std::vector<uint32_t> data;
42  serializeToIntegers(&data);
43  // Not quite actually a word since we're in a 64-bit age now, but whatever.
44  for (uint32_t word : data) {
45  proto->add_voxel_data(word);
46  }
47 }
48 
49 template <typename VoxelType>
50 void Block<VoxelType>::mergeBlock(const Block<VoxelType>& other_block) {
51  CHECK_EQ(other_block.voxel_size(), voxel_size());
52  CHECK_EQ(other_block.voxels_per_side(), voxels_per_side());
53 
54  if (!other_block.has_data()) {
55  return;
56  } else {
57  has_data() = true;
58  updated() = true;
59 
60  for (IndexElement voxel_idx = 0;
61  voxel_idx < static_cast<IndexElement>(num_voxels()); ++voxel_idx) {
62  mergeVoxelAIntoVoxelB<VoxelType>(
63  other_block.getVoxelByLinearIndex(voxel_idx),
64  &(getVoxelByLinearIndex(voxel_idx)));
65  }
66  }
67 }
68 
69 template <typename VoxelType>
70 size_t Block<VoxelType>::getMemorySize() const {
71  size_t size = 0u;
72 
73  // Calculate size of members
74  size += sizeof(voxels_per_side_);
75  size += sizeof(voxel_size_);
76  size += sizeof(origin_);
77  size += sizeof(num_voxels_);
78  size += sizeof(voxel_size_inv_);
79  size += sizeof(block_size_);
80 
81  size += sizeof(has_data_);
82  size += sizeof(updated_);
83 
84  if (num_voxels_ > 0u) {
85  size += (num_voxels_ * sizeof(voxels_[0]));
86  }
87  return size;
88 }
